Title: Bus Tour
Plot: An important person in Pawnee dies while Leslie is on a bus tour for the final day of her campaign. Meanwhile Andy investigates a security threat, and Chris finds a cure for his depression.
GuestStars: Paul Rudd, Kathryn Hahn, Mike O'Malley, Kirk Fox, Jay Jackson, Leonard Robinson, Brenda Canela, Danielle Kennedy, James M. Connor, Avery Phillips, Lukas Martin, Nicole Alexandra Shipley
